info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 7:56PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madera and west central Fresno Counties through 830 PM PDT... At 756 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Firebaugh, or 14 miles southwest of Madera, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madera, Kerman, Parkwood, Parksdale and Biola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
